languages.text: "Я боюсь даже предположить, с какой проблемой вы в следующий раз станете отвлекать Вольного Торговца. Может, предложите Лорд-капитану лично разнимать кабацкие драки? Я дал вам инструменты, необходимые для решения проблемы, — нужно было просто их применить".

"I dread to think what problem you will disturb the Rogue Trader with next. Perhaps you will ask the Lord Captain to break up brawls in the messroom? I have already given you the means to resolve this problem — you simply need to use them."
languages.original_text: "Я боюсь даже предположить, с какой проблемой вы в следующий раз станете отвлекать Вольного Торговца. Может, предложите Лорд-капитану лично разнимать кабацкие драки? Я дал вам инструменты, необходимые для решения проблемы, — нужно было просто их применить".

traits.locale_text: "I dread to think what problem you will disturb the Rogue Trader with next. Perhaps you will ask the Lord Captain to break up brawls in the messroom? I have already given you the means to resolve this problem — you simply need to use them."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I dread to think what problem you will disturb the Rogue Trader with next. Perhaps you will ask the Lord Captain to break up brawls in the messroom? I have already given you the means to resolve this problem — you simply need to use them."

traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “我简直不敢想象，接下来你会用什么样的问题来打扰行商浪人？你会不会要求舰长大人制止餐厅里的争吵？我已经给了你解决这个问题的办法，你只要好好执行就可以了。”
languages.original_text: "I dread to think what problem you will disturb the Rogue Trader with next. Perhaps you will ask the Lord Captain to break up brawls in the messroom? I have already given you the means to resolve this problem — you simply need to use them."

traits.locale_text: “我简直不敢想象，接下来你会用什么样的问题来打扰行商浪人？你会不会要求舰长大人制止餐厅里的争吵？我已经给了你解决这个问题的办法，你只要好好执行就可以了。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Me preocupa pensar en qué problema traerá a la atención de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente después. ¿Le pedirá que intervenga en las reyertas de la cantina, tal vez? Le he dado las herramientas necesarias para resolver el problema. Solo tiene que usarlas».
languages.original_text: "I dread to think what problem you will disturb the Rogue Trader with next. Perhaps you will ask the Lord Captain to break up brawls in the messroom? I have already given you the means to resolve this problem — you simply need to use them."

traits.locale_text: «Me preocupa pensar en qué problema traerá a la atención de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente después. ¿Le pedirá que intervenga en las reyertas de la cantina, tal vez? Le he dado las herramientas necesarias para resolver el problema. Solo tiene que usarlas».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「自由開拓者を次にどんな問題で邪魔するのか、考えるのも恐ろしい。もしかしたら、ロード・キャプテンに食堂での乱闘を仲裁してもらうつもりなのか？この問題を解決する手段はすでに与えたはずだ…お前はそれを活用するだけで良い」
languages.original_text: "I dread to think what problem you will disturb the Rogue Trader with next. Perhaps you will ask the Lord Captain to break up brawls in the messroom? I have already given you the means to resolve this problem — you simply need to use them."

traits.locale_text: 「自由開拓者を次にどんな問題で邪魔するのか、考えるのも恐ろしい。もしかしたら、ロード・キャプテンに食堂での乱闘を仲裁してもらうつもりなのか？この問題を解決する手段はすでに与えたはずだ…お前はそれを活用するだけで良い」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Mir graut bei dem Gedanken, mit welchem Problem Ihr {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} als Nächstes belästigt. Vielleicht bittet Ihr den Lord Captain, eine Prügelei in der Messe zu schlichten? Ich habe Euch die Mittel zur Lösung dieses Problems bereits an die Hand gegeben — Ihr müsst sie lediglich einsetzen."
languages.original_text: "I dread to think what problem you will disturb the Rogue Trader with next. Perhaps you will ask the Lord Captain to break up brawls in the messroom? I have already given you the means to resolve this problem — you simply need to use them."

traits.locale_text: "Mir graut bei dem Gedanken, mit welchem Problem Ihr {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} als Nächstes belästigt. Vielleicht bittet Ihr den Lord Captain, eine Prügelei in der Messe zu schlichten? Ich habe Euch die Mittel zur Lösung dieses Problems bereits an die Hand gegeben — Ihr müsst sie lediglich einsetzen."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Je n'ose imaginer quels autres prétextes fumeux vous inventerez la prochaine fois pour venir déranger {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}. Autant lui demander d'arbitrer les bagarres qui se produisent régulièrement au réfectoire, pendant que vous y êtes. Je vous ai déjà donné les moyens de régler le problème, il ne tient qu'à vous de les utiliser. »
languages.original_text: "I dread to think what problem you will disturb the Rogue Trader with next. Perhaps you will ask the Lord Captain to break up brawls in the messroom? I have already given you the means to resolve this problem — you simply need to use them."

traits.locale_text: « Je n'ose imaginer quels autres prétextes fumeux vous inventerez la prochaine fois pour venir déranger {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}. Autant lui demander d'arbitrer les bagarres qui se produisent régulièrement au réfectoire, pendant que vous y êtes. Je vous ai déjà donné les moyens de régler le problème, il ne tient qu'à vous de les utiliser. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Hür Tacir'i başka hangi meselelerle rahatsız edeceğinizi düşünmeye korkuyorum. Yoksa Lord Kaptan'dan yemekhanedeki kavgalara müdahil olmasını mı isteyeceksiniz? Meseleyi çözecek kaynakları zaten sağladım, bunları kullanmanız kâfi gelecektir."
languages.original_text: "I dread to think what problem you will disturb the Rogue Trader with next. Perhaps you will ask the Lord Captain to break up brawls in the messroom? I have already given you the means to resolve this problem — you simply need to use them."
